alert.note: Alert for Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 06 at 2:37AM MST until January 06 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Southwest Phillips County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon MST today. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from noon today to 6 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road and limited visibility. Use caution while driving.rous.The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
